author: julianfoad
msg: In the JavaHL code, simplify usage of makeJByteArray() by accepting 'void *'
so callers don't need to do so much type-casting, and by adding a version
char *'. Add an overloaded version that takes 'svn_string_t *'.

author: julianfoad
msg: In the JavaHL bindings: fix error reporting.  It could fail an assertion
while trying to report an error trace.
(putErrorsInTrace): Use 'dirent' functions to process a source file name,
as this can be an absolute path depending on how it was compiled.

author: jlboudart
msg: Make manifest plugin less dependent of retrieve.dependencies property
Don't fail if no dependencies was found

author: jdyer
msg: SOLR-4019: Fix tests that are invalid due to logging change

author: jdyer
msg: SOLR-4019: Fix tests that are invalid due to logging change
